definition: to worship money/to be mad about money
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The materialistic pattern of life is one in which money predominates over everything.
sentences.chinese: 真正的拜金主义生活方式是让金钱凌驾于一切之上。

sentences.english: Avoid the Gold Digger type at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能避开拜金类型的女孩。

sentences.english: The trade and the mammonism seriously corrodes the society lives each stratification plane.
sentences.chinese: 商业化及拜金主义严重侵蚀着社会生活各个层面。

sentences.english: I don't know somebody who are mammonism .
sentences.chinese: 我不理解那些拜金主义的人。

sentences.english: The school also serves as match-maker between the gold and diggers.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校还充当了有钱人和拜金女的媒人。

sentences.english: There has been undesirable trend in recent years towards the worship of money.
sentences.chinese: 近年来出现了对社会有害的拜金主义倾向。

sentences.english: The money-oriented people are cold and indifferent to each other.
sentences.chinese: 拜金主义的人是冷和冷漠。

sentences.english: The money-oriented people are cold and indifferent to each other.
sentences.chinese: 拜金主义使人际关系冷漠了。

sentences.english: Worship, indifference, lonely, tongue, disguise self protection.
sentences.chinese: 拜金，冷漠，孤单，毒舌，伪装，自我保护。

sentences.english: “No idol, ” he said, “is more debasing than the worship of money.”
sentences.chinese: 没有信仰比拜金主义更可耻。

sentences.english: China has yet to launch an equal-opportunity school for male gold-diggers.
sentences.chinese: 中国还没有开设一所为拜金男提供均等机会的学校。

sentences.english: And they worry if they go out hunting girls they’d only find gold diggers.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心，如果去追求女孩，只会引来拜金女。

sentences.english: Money worship is the extreme presentation of the secular utility values.
sentences.chinese: 拜金主义是世俗功利价值观的极端形式。

sentences.english: In the money-oriented society, some people are becoming more and more impersonal.
sentences.chinese: 在拜金主义的社会，有些人越来越没有人情味的。

definition: to favor the rich and disdain the poor (idiom)/snobbish
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
"green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
